poem:
Title: "Variations on a Love Theme"

In the theater of desire,
two are scripted, one uncredited.
An experiment of amour, a binary dance brought to trinity.
Hair of strangers on the pillow,
a ballet of jealousy twirls in shadows.
A tangled polyphony, yet serenades are sweeter sung in pairs.
In theory lucid, in reality blurred,
in love clear, in polyamory, obscured.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative.
